mapper.insert: insert into openexperiment.u_stu (id, code, email, fix_phone, id_card, mobile_phone, `password`, qq_num, real_name, sex, user_type, institute, major, grade, work_unit, class_num) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qqNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{institute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classNum,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update openexperiment.u_stu set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fix_phone = #{fixPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq_num = #{qqNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, institute = #{institute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, work_unit = #{workUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_num = #{classNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where code = #{code,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, code, email, fix_phone, id_card, mobile_phone, `password`, qq_num, real_name, sex, user_type, institute, major, grade, work_unit, class_num from openexperiment.u_stu where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, code, email, fix_phone, id_card, mobile_phone, `password`, qq_num, real_name, sex, user_type, institute, major, grade, work_unit, class_num from openexperiment.u_stu

select u_stu.id, u_stu.code, u_stu.email, u_stu.fix_phone, u_stu.id_card, u_stu.mobile_phone, u_stu.`password`, u_stu.qq_num, u_stu.real_name, u_stu.sex, u_stu.user_type, u_stu.institute, u_stu.major, u_stu.grade, u_stu.class_num from openexperiment.u_stu where code = #{userCode}

select u_stu.id, u_stu.code, u_stu.email, u_stu.fix_phone, u_stu.id_card, u_stu.mobile_phone, u_stu.`password`, u_stu.qq_num, u_stu.real_name, u_stu.sex, u_stu.user_type, u_stu.institute, u_stu.major, u_stu.grade, u_stu.class_num from openexperiment.u_stu inner join openexperiment.user_project_group on u_stu.code = user_project_group.user_id where user_project_group.project_group_id = #{projectId} and user_project_group.status = 2

select u_stu.id, code, real_name, institute, major, email, fix_phone, id_card, mobile_phone, password, qq_num, sex, user_type, grade, work_unit, class_num from openexperiment.u_stu inner join openexperiment.user_role on code = user_role.user_id where locate(#{keyWord},`code`) limit 50

select u_stu.id, u_stu.code, u_stu.email, u_stu.fix_phone, u_stu.id_card, u_stu.mobile_phone, u_stu.`password`, u_stu.qq_num, u_stu.real_name, u_stu.sex, u_stu.user_type, u_stu.institute, u_stu.major, u_stu.grade, u_stu.class_num from openexperiment.u_stu inner join openexperiment.user_project_group on user_project_group.member_role = 2 and user_project_group.project_group_id = #{projectGroupId} limit 1

select.if: select u_stu.id, u_stu.code, u_stu.email, u_stu.fix_phone, u_stu.id_card, u_stu.mobile_phone, u_stu.`password`, u_stu.qq_num, u_stu.real_name, u_stu.sex, u_stu.user_type, u_stu.institute, u_stu.major, u_stu.grade, u_stu.class_num from openexperiment.u_stu inner join openexperiment.user_role on u_stu.code = user_role.user_id where u_stu.code = #{userCode} and user_role.role_id = #{role}

select u_teach.code, u_teach.email, u_teach.fix_phone, u_teach.id_card, u_teach.mobile_phone, u_teach.`password`, u_teach.qq_num, u_teach.real_name, u_teach.sex, u_teach.user_type, u_teach.institute, u_teach.major, u_teach.grade, from openexperiment.u_teach inner join openexperiment.user_role on u_teach.code = user_role.user_id where u_teach.code = #{userCode} and user_role.role_id = #{role}
